title: Fantasy I & II - Game Music Pack - Orchestral, RPG, Fantasy, Emotional BGM
description: Epic Fantasy is a game music pack crafted exclusively for RPGs, Adventure, and Fantasy games, breathing life into your projects with its immersive soundscapes.
longDescription:
Epic Fantasy: Breathe Life into Your Game Worlds


From normal heroes saving their village to talking animals fighting for kingdom-wide justice, Epic Fantasy is a game music pack made for the stories we all know and love.


This pack is crafted exclusively for RPGs, Adventure, and Fantasy games, bringing your projects to life with two unique sets of immersive soundscapes.


Listen to the soundtrack packs here:

  • Epic Fantasy Pack 1
  • Epic Fantasy Pack 2


What’s inside Epic Fantasy I:

  • 7 original high-quality music tracks
  • 7 original high-quality music loops
  • 14 total files
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License


What’s inside Epic Fantasy II:

  • 7 original high-quality music tracks
  • 7 original high-quality music loops
  • 14 total files
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License


Total files: 28


Tracklists:


Pack 1:

(00:00) 01 - Boundaries

(00:33) 02 - A Whole New World

(01:03) 03 - A Whole New World (Piano Version)

(01:37) 04 - Dancing In Human Flesh

(02:07) 05 - Facing Monsters

(02:35) 06 - In The Place

(03:09) 07 - In The Place (Alt Version)


Pack 2:

(00:00) 01 - In The Sky

(00:33) 02 - Not Everything was Ok

(01:03) 03 - New Creatures

(01:37) 04 - Water Time

(02:07) 05 - Water Time (Full Version)

(02:35) 06 - Long Ago

(03:09) 07 - Hesitation


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


Benefits:

With this game music/soundtrack pack, you also:

– Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered, so they sound great in any device that your game is played.

– Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered to reach a fully congruent volume within the full soundtrack.

– Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, so you can repeat the music in the game seamlessly.


About the Composer:


Lufus is a renowned music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks of multi-million downloaded games, including:

  • Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)
  • Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)
  • Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads)


Support & Help:

For any assistance downloading these soundtrack packs, please contact iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Exclusively crafted for RPG, Adventure, and Fantasy games: Immerse players in rich soundscapes tailored to these genres.
  • Two unique packs: Provides a diverse range of musical themes and moods to suit various in-game scenarios.
  • High-quality Audio: WAV format ensures pristine sound quality across all devices.
  • Seamless looping: All music tracks are loop-able, allowing for continuous playback without interruption.
  • Created by an industry professional: Composed by Lufus, a composer with experience in creating soundtracks for multi-million download games.


Number of Audio WAVs: 14 per pack (28 total)

Number of Audio Cues: 14 per pack (28 total)


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 32bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22


Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes (WAV files are platform-independent)


Documentation: https://youtu.be/ubdRX4LAc6w.

Important/Additional Notes:

  • The music is delivered as individual WAV files, giving developers flexibility in implementation.
  • The composer's contact information (iamlufus@gmail.com) is available for support inquiries.
